description:
The daimyo of Mikawa, Matsudaira Motoyasu was finally able to break ties with the Imagawa Clan that he was forced to serve for years. He arrives at Kiyosu Castle to form an alliance with Nobunaga. Chidori seems extremely interested in meeting Hattori Hanzo, who serves Motoyasu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiyosu Doumei to Motoyasu no Shinobi
L’alliance de Kiyosu et le ninja de Motoyasu
The Kiyosu Alliance and Motoyasu`s Shinobi
清洲同盟と元康の忍び
